scripts.build:prod: npx webpack --config webpack.prod.js && docker build --pull -t whiteboard-frontend:prod .
scripts.full-start:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose_dev.yml down ; docker-compose -f docker-compose_dev.yml build ; docker-compose -f docker-compose_dev.yml up -d
scripts.full-start:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose_prod.yml down ; docker-compose -f docker-compose_prod.yml build ; docker-compose -f docker-compose_prod.yml up -d
scripts.start:dev: docker rm whiteboard-frontend-dev ; docker run --name whiteboard-frontend-dev -p 127.0.0.1:8080:80 -v ${PWD}/dist/:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro -v ${PWD}/build/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -d nginx:mainline-alpine
scripts.start:prod: docker rm whiteboard-frontend-prod ; docker run --name whiteboard-frontend-prod -p 127.0.0.1:8080:8080 -d whiteboard-frontend:prod
